name: HedleyKow Cosplay
profile:
We are a bunch of Cosplayers from England usually based vaguely near Wales but not always. We aim for a fairly regular posting schedule which we mostly stick too

Our videos will probably remain mostly CMVs but we have several sketches and webseries in the works too !

We definitely want to hear from you - anything from constructive criticism to requests and praise ((please validate us)) - so feel free to contact us on any of our medias :D

Find us on  Facebook- https://www.facebook.com/hedleykowcosplay/
                     Instagram- https://www.instagram.com/hedleykowcosplay/
                    Twitter - https://twitter.com/HedleyKCosplay

Featuring:

Peggy / Peggy Cosplay        
Hal / Halusional Cosplay
